MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:57PM in the ST7 postcode area of Stoke on Trent following reports of a grounded overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 2:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:00PM on 1st November 2020.
